item_category: Three cameras. Unlimited possibilities. Shoot amazing videos and photos with the Ultra Wide, Wide and Telephoto cameras. Capture your best low-light photos with Night mode. Watch HDR films and programmes on the Super Retina XDR display — the brightest iPhone display yet. Experience unprecedented performance with A13 Bionic for gaming, augmented reality (AR) and photography. And get all-day battery life and a new level of water resistance. All in the first iPhone powerful enough to be called Pro.

Hvaing upgraded from an Iphone 8 this has been a huge improvement. In true Apple style the process of moving all my apps and contacts across was a breeze and I was up and running in under 20 mins. The camera is incredible for such a small peice of kit, allowing me to take some very nice shots at night. 

I've found the battery life to be plenty long enough for what I need. Overall very happy

I ordered the phone in the late afternoon and the morning after was already available for collection. 
I recommend Argos, best price I could find for a new iPhone pro.
Buying with Argos was easy and fast. Perfect transaction and the item arrived earlier than expected. So happy I choose to buy it at Argos and using Argos Card, which is even better.

A great customer service and helpful. I love the phone, the camera, picture quality, design, colour, battery life and I just satisfied everything about it. I recommend this product to anyone. Argos is really reliable and one of the best.
Very good phone I would recommend it the features are very good

It is great looking, expensive but still a good price well worth it

Went from 8 to 11 and I really like it. Feels faster than an already fast phone. In some apps you can really see the improved graphics even the XR's A12 would have brought, but I like the A13 processor in the iPhone 11 series for the improvements on the low power cores that it brings. My daily routine that would get me 4 and a half to five hours now only takes me down to 60% battery. The increase in RAM from my iPhone 8's 2GB to the 11's 4GB also sees fewer of my apps being closed
The service was amazing , got it the next day . The camera quality is amazing as well as battery that lasts me days . Great purchase

Ordered my new phone 11 pro 
From Argos, very good and fast service from Argos as always.
Always love shopping from Argos it’s very easy simple and hassle free.
Lovely phone to handle and easy to transfer data from my old iPhone. The colour is more like grey than green.

My son had been moaning about his,old phone for ages so it was the perfect gift for his special birthday. Argos had the exact model he had been looking at. It was very easy to place the order and it was delivered on the day and time I had requested. Excellent service
The iPhone 11 Pro is by far the best iPhone I have ever owned. Highly recommended !
Favorite phone i ever had

This is a great phone, especially the camera and portrait function. Battery lasts all day which is great you don't have to carry a charger or battery block.

This was an upgrade from an iPhone 7. The battery life is so much better and has been lasting around 1.5 days with moderate use. The camera takes really nice photos with great depth to the images. Love the Face ID and Apple Pay is great. 
The phone is quite a bit heavier than an iPhone 7 probably due to the much improved battery life.

Purchased this as an upgrade to my iPhone 7.

Very fast, excellent screen and general build quality, as you'd expect from an Apple product and for the price. 

The camera on this is exceptional, its actually better than my actual camera - only difference is my actual camera has better quality over a greater zoom distance - but thats as you would expect. 

Came with a fast charger, which charges the phone a lot quicker than standard, and the battery life lasts well to!

I really like the phone. My previous device got snatched out of my hand by a man on a bicycle, so I had a range of options given by my insurers. I went for an exact replacement as the 11 Pro fully meets my needs - super fast, truly amazing photos & videos, battery lasts a full day easily.

My insurers sent me to Argos - not a choice I would make in the future following the abysmal experience I had - limited store stock in faraway stores, no home delivery, archaic nonsense collection process.

The iPhone pro was bought for Christmas for my daughter from her uncle. She was over the moon with her present and loves everything about her new phone. I would recommend the iPhone pro over the pro max as the size is just right for holding. The pro max is more of a small tablet size, so not so good for putting in your pocket.
I bought the iPhone 11 the phones brill at but I wish I had bought the pro Max instead however I’m still really happy to have purchased it
Best phone about at the moment

Coming from an iPhone 7 it was a big jump. Great build quality and design. The two stand out features for me are the cameras and battery life. Charging it to 100% on Tuesday evening and with regular usage by Thursday evening I had 51% left on my battery.

If you are upgrading from an older phone like the 5SE or the 6 (which was the case for me)  it is worth the money spent. The cameras take amazing photos and the software stabilisation is excellent. Don’t go, if you can, for the 64GB version - 256 GB are required if you want to use the full potential of photo and video department because high resolution can take several hundreds of GigaBytes. Fast and secure 3D, large and amazing screen and much more make this phone great.

Midnight green 256gb iPhone - Wow, superb. Amazing, super fast and all features and design easy to use, top iphone

The iPhone 11 pro is an excellent update to an already brilliant phone. At first I wasn’t sure on the look, with the 3 camera lenses, but I must say it’s grown on me and I now find it to be a very good looking phone.

The quality of the cameras is excellent for a mobile phone. Also the battery life is much improved and definitely noticeable. With my normal average use I’ve found I can get 2 days use from a full charge - which was unheard of on my previous iPhone!
Best phone , i love the new cameras and how fast it is
It comes with a very nice camera clarity. Features are lovely. Brilliant phone. Loved it.
Best Buy!! Looks and feels great. And performance is unbeatable. :)
